version_description: Updated for IOS10!

Thank you for your support. We work constantly to keep improving Astro Future.

• Now Astro Future creates full detailed PDF reports
• Added notifications
• Fixed a nasty bug where calculation of retrogrades could result in a crash in some instances
Fixed a bug that can prevent photos from being shown in the astro contacts overview.

We finally added the feature that so many of you requested. It is now possible to select a date and see the planets move slowly towards that date at a speed of your own preference. Just press the star under the date bar and select "Move heavens slowly to custom date".

If you like Astro Future, please leave a review on the App Store. This helps us a lot.

We are proud to introduce the latest Astroid Package. Now you can add your favourite astroids to natal and transit charts: Ceres, Pallas Athena, Juno, Vesta and the centaur astroids: Chiron and Pholus.

• Added asteroids to pdf reports.
• Fixed an issue that can cause a rare crash for certain natal charts or pdf reports.

• Added asteroids to pdf reports.
• Fixed an issue that can cause a rare crash for certain natal charts or pdf reports.
Fixed an issue that can cause a crash when looking up your birth place.

• Now available on Apple Watch!
• New beautiful personalised horoscope snap shots to share with family and friends

We fixed an issue where asteroids were not shown on all charts with the Asteroid Pack installed

• Now available on Apple Watch!
• New beautiful personalised horoscope snap shots to share with family and friends

Fixed an issue where asteroids were not shown on all charts with the Asteroid Pack installed.
General stability and performance improvements.
Performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Optimized for iOS 11.
• New UI for iPhone X.
Fixed an issue where in app purchases can be unavailable in some rare cases.
Fixed an issue where in app purchases can be unavailable in some rare cases.

Now you can tap on any aspect in natal and transit charts for instant interpretations. 
Tap multiple times on aspects that are drawn close to each other to alternate between them. 
Added support for Spotlight Search.

Thank you for using Astro Future:
- You can now go back all the way to 1900 with the Time Pack installed
- Improved calendar to jump great distances in time

You can now select Special Moments by tapping the moon icon at the bottom of the interpretation pane.

• Detailed interpretations for asteroids and Lilith with the Asteroids Pack purchased
• Black Moon Lilith added
• Fixed some bugs

• Added detailed interpretations for asteroids and Lilith with the Asteroids Pack purchased
• Black Moon Lilith added
• Fixed a terrible bug that prevents some users from opening the app
Fixed a bug where the circles for elements, qualities and dualities were not always updated in the PDF reports.

• Added orbs for aspects
 • Added interpretations for planets in houses and signs in natal charts

• Added orbs for aspects
 • Added interpretations for planets in houses and signs in natal charts 
• Fixed a bug where PDF reports of natal charts could cause a crash

• Added sidereal zodiac systems: Fagan/Bradley, Lahiri, Raman, Krishnamurti Paddhati, Takra I and Takra II
• Fixed a bug where elements, qualities and dualities were not always calculated correctly
Fixed a bug where large PDFs of Horoscopes could cause a crash

• Added support for iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max and Apple Watch 4
• Optimised for iOS 12
• Improved pdf documents
Fixed a bug in the calculations for Whole Sign house cusps when using Sidereal zodiacs

• Introducing the new today extension: ”Your aspect of the day"
• Added groups to Astro Contacts for better organisation of contacts
• Added 3D Touch support

• Added a handy astrological reference in settings
• Got rid of some nasty bugs

• Added two more ayanamshas: DeLuce and Djhwal Khul
• General improvements and bug fixes
General improvements and bug fixes
General improvements and bug fixes
Fixed an issue for users with large amounts of astro contacts

• Updated the symbol of Saturn
• Corrected the Daylight Saving Time for some timezones for dates before 1967

• 'Aspect of the Day' is now available on the Apple Watch
• New complication for Apple Watch that shows the current progression of the Sun
• Added 'other' gender
• Added support for Dark Mode
• Added support for iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max

• Save your Astro Contacts and share them with friends
• New daily horoscope notifications

• Save your Astro Contacts and share them with friends
• New daily horoscope notifications

• Save your Astro Contacts and share them with friends
• New daily horoscope notifications

• Save your Astro Contacts and share them with friends
• New daily horoscope notifications
Time travel is now extended from 1900 to 2050 with the Time Pack purchased

Time travel is now extended from 1900 to 2050 with the Time Pack purchased.
Bug fixes.
Fixed a bug where positions of Pluto and North Node were not correct for dates after 2026

• Orbs can now be adjusted
• Added support for iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Mini, iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max
A hidden New Year surprise will be available from 20/12 onwards.
